snippet: American manufacturing growth improved and private-sector businesses added jobs at a robust pace in June, data released on Wednesday showed.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its manufacturing index rose to 53.5 in June from 52.8 in May, signaling expansion.
lead_paragraph: American manufacturing growth improved and private-sector businesses added jobs at a robust pace in June, data released on Wednesday showed.

headline.main: Purchasing Managers’ Index Shows Manufacturing Growth
headline.print_headline: Purchasing Managers’ Index Shows Manufacturing Growth
